item.title: Help barrows chest barrow item % rate
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“lugmfr, post:1, topic:342875”]how would i lower the % rate you get a barrows item out of the chest? heres the code correct me if its the wrong one.

public static int Barrows[] = {592,592,592,592,592,592,592,592,592,592,592,592,5 92,592,4734,4710,4724,4726,4728,4730,4718,4732,473 6,4738,4716,4720,4722,4753,4747,4755,4757,4759,470 8,4712,4714,4745,4749,4751,7462};

public static int randomBarrows()
{
return Barrows[(int)(Math.random()*Barrows.length)];
}
public static int Runes[] = {560, 560, 560,
565, 565,
561, 561, 561, 561,
558, 558, 558, 558, 558, 558,
563, 563, 563, 563,
553, 553,
562, 562, 562, 562, 562,
4740};
public static int randomRunes()
{
return Runes[(int)(Math.random()*Runes.length)];
}[/quote]

Add more ‘592’ to the int[] Barrows. Right now there is a 1 in 39 chance that the item will be barrows. The ratio is that for every 14 '592’s, there’s 25 barrows items.

Read full topic
